top.title: Ecommerce Trends: How Walmart is using AI
top.snippet:
As new Walmart CEO John Furner prepares to take over from Doug McMillon in February, Furner can expect the retail giant’s artificial intelligence (AI) and agentic commerce strategies to come up frequently as he decides how to best put agents and machine learning to use. “Every job we’ve got is going to change in some […]
The post Ecommerce Trends: How Walmart is using AI appeared first on Digital Commerce 360.
top.rerankWhy: Walmart's AI strategies directly impact retail operations
top.aiSummary: AI-generated summary: Walmart's new CEO, John Furner, will focus on utilizing artificial intelligence and agentic commerce strategies as he takes over from Doug McMillon. The retail giant plans to incorporate agents and machine learning to transform various job roles.

top.title: Most consumers interacted with AI customer service during holiday shopping
top.snippet: Consumers’ response to AI and automation is largely positive, but a majority still say humans provide better support, a Liveops survey found.
top.rerankWhy: Consumer interactions with AI in retail are crucial insights
top.aiSummary:
AI-generated summary:
A Liveops survey revealed that while most consumers had positive interactions with AI customer service during holiday shopping, they still believe human support is superior.

top.title: Microsoft introduces agentic AI tools to automate retail and B2B commerce operations
top.snippet:
Microsoft has announced a new set of agentic artificial intelligence (AI) tools to Copilot aimed at automating core retail and B2B commerce functions, including digital checkout, product data management, merchandising and store operations. The company said it designed the agentic AI tools, which it’s delivering through Microsoft Copilot and Copilot Studio, to reduce manual work, […]
The post Microsoft introduces agentic AI tools to automate retail and B2B commerce operations appeared first on Di...
top.rerankWhy: Microsoft's AI tools automate key retail functions
top.aiSummary:
AI-generated summary:
Microsoft has unveiled agentic AI tools through Copilot to automate retail and B2B commerce operations, focusing on tasks like digital checkout and merchandising to reduce manual work.

top.title: Spangle AI raises $15 million to build agentic infrastructure for ecommerce
top.snippet:
Spangle AI has raised $15 million in funding to expand its artificial intelligence platform that it designed to connect AI-driven product discovery with real-time online conversion. NewRoad Capital Partners led the Spangle AI funding round. Madrona, DNX Ventures, Streamlined Ventures and strategic angel investors participated as well. The financing brings Spangle’s total funding to $21 […]
The post Spangle AI raises $15 million to build agentic infrastructure for ecommerce appeared first on Digi...
top.rerankWhy: Spangle AI's funding supports ecommerce AI infrastructure
top.aiSummary:
AI-generated summary:
Spangle AI secured $15 million in funding to enhance its AI platform for connecting product discovery with online conversion in ecommerce. The funding round was led by NewRoad Capital Partners, with participation from Madrona, DNX Ventures, Streamlined Ventures, and strategic angel investors.

top.title: Amazon rolls out Alexa+ web experience for its AI assistant
top.snippet:
Amazon’s artificial intelligence (AI)-powered assistant began rolling out new features for its Alexa+ tier of service in 2025 — and now the online retail giant is making that experience more widely available through a web interface. Emphasizing shopping, smart home controls and other Alexa-associated capabilities, Amazon announced that logged-in users would be able to access […]
The post Amazon rolls out Alexa+ web experience for its AI assistant appeared first on Digital Commerce 360.
top.rerankWhy: Amazon's Alexa+ enhances customer shopping experience
top.aiSummary: AI-generated summary: Amazon has expanded its Alexa+ service to include a web interface, allowing users to access shopping, smart home controls, and other Alexa features. This move aims to enhance the overall experience for customers.

top.title: Early AI Signals from Holiday Sales
top.snippet:
The raw totals for AI-driven shopping were small, but the coming impact will likely be massive.

top.title: Walmart adds tech veteran to board as it preps for AI era
top.snippet: Shishir Mehrotra, who co-founded an AI platform and also has experience at YouTube, joins the board ahead of John Furner’s move to CEO.
top.rerankWhy: Walmart's board changes signal commitment to AI integration
top.aiSummary:
AI-Generated Summary:
Shishir Mehrotra, a tech veteran with AI platform experience and a background at YouTube, joins Walmart's board as the company prepares for the AI era, coinciding with John Furner's appointment as CEO.

top.title: US e-commerce spend reached nearly $258B over the holidays
top.snippet: Adobe Analytics data found consumer spending grew 6.8% compared to 2024, with buy now, pay later usage reaching a new high.
top.rerankWhy: Highlights significant holiday ecommerce spending growth
top.aiSummary:
AI-Generated Summary:
According to Adobe Analytics data reported by Retail Dive on January 7, 2026, US e-commerce spending during the holidays rose to nearly $258 billion, showing a 6.8% increase from the previous year. The usage of buy now, pay later services also reached a new peak.

top.title: What shaped retail’s holiday season in 2025
top.snippet: It was a year of AI-generated gift recommendations, tariff upheaval and increased financial stress on shoppers.
top.rerankWhy: Analyzes key trends shaping retail's holiday season
top.aiSummary: AI-generated gift recommendations, tariff upheaval, and financial stress on shoppers were key factors that shaped the retail industry during the 2025 holiday season, as reported by Retail Dive on January 6, 2026.

top.title: Retailers like Kroger, CVS plan many more screens for in-store ads in 2026
top.snippet: In 2026, retailers like Kroger and CVS are planning to install more screens in more stores to display advertising and other content -- an evolution of what has historically been limited to small experiments.
top.rerankWhy: Discusses in-store advertising expansion by major retailers
top.aiSummary:
AI-Generated Summary:
Retailers such as Kroger and CVS are set to increase the number of in-store screens for advertising and content display in 2026, moving beyond small-scale trials.

top.title: Inflation set to remain sticky in 2026
top.snippet:
As we enter into 2026, inflation rates are increasing as prices continued to edge up at the end of last year. According to the British Retail Consortium, shop price inflation picked up to 0.7% year on year in December, against growth of 0.6% in November. This is in line with the 3-month average of 0.7%. […]
The post Inflation set to remain sticky in 2026 appeared first on Professional Jeweller.
top.rerankWhy: Discusses inflation impact on retail pricing
top.aiSummary: AI-generated summary: Inflation rates are on the rise in 2026, with shop price inflation reaching 0.7% year on year in December according to the British Retail Consortium. This trend is expected to persist in the jewellery industry.

top.title: How indie retailers will shape the high street in 2026
top.snippet:
One of the things I love most about working with independent retailers is their resilience and adaptability. They have weathered everything the world has thrown at them over the past few years, including shifting consumer behaviours, economic pressures, rising costs, and the arrival of new technologies. Yet they have kept innovating, kept experimenting, and kept […]

top.rerankWhy: Highlights indie retailers' adaptability and innovation
top.aiSummary: AI-generated summary: Independent retailers in the jewellery industry have shown resilience and adaptability in the face of challenges, shaping the high street with innovation and experimentation in 2026.

top.title: Jewellery designer Solange Azagury-Partridge receives MBE
top.snippet:
British jewellery designer Solange Azagury-Partridge has been awarded a Mem­ber of the Order of the Brit­ish Empire (MBE) for her ser­vices to design. As always, these awards are handed out dur­ing the year by King Charles III and mem­bers of the royal fam­ily. Based in London, Azagury-Partridge runs her own jewellery brand Solange, with a […]
The post Jewellery designer Solange Azagury-Partridge receives MBE appeared first on Professional Jeweller.
top.rerankWhy: Recognizes a designer's influence in the industry
top.aiSummary: AI-generated summary: Jewellery designer Solange Azagury-Partridge has been awarded an MBE for her services to design by King Charles III. She runs her own jewellery brand, Solange, based in London.

oneSentenceSummary: Walmart's AI strategies and rising inflation are shaping retail dynamics as companies adapt to changing consumer behaviors and economic pressures.
introParagraph: Walmart implements AI strategies to address changing consumer behaviors amid rising inflation pressures. Fast Retailing reports profits as the retail landscape evolves, while De Beers sees a shift in diamond demand within the luxury and consumer sectors.
